Package ohos.agp.window.service

Class WindowManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • ohos.agp.window.service.WindowManager

  • public class WindowManager
extends Object
    Creates a singleton WindowManager for creating and destroying Window objects.
    Since:
    1

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      static class  WindowManager.LayoutConfig
      Encapsulates the layout attributes, flags, and constants used with a Window.
      static class  WindowManager.PermissionException
      Describes the exception thrown when creating a window.

    • Method Detail

      • getInstance

        public static WindowManager getInstance​()
        Obtains a singleton WindowManager.

        This is a static factory method.

        Returns:
        Returns the WindowManager instance.

      • getTopWindow

        public Optional<Window> getTopWindow​()
        Obtains the top window of the current application.
        Returns:
        Returns the top window of the current application.

      • getWindowCount

        public int getWindowCount​(Context context)
        Obtains the number of all windows of the current application.
        Parameters:
        context - Indicates the context of the windows.
        Returns:
        Returns the number of all windows of the current application.

      • addComponent

        public Window addComponent​(ComponentContainer component,
                           Context context,
                           int typeFlag)
        Adds a window based on the component, context, and window type.

        Components containing independent layers cannot be added, for example, WebView, SurfaceProvider, and ohos.agp.components.textureprovider.TextureProvider.

        Parameters:
        component - Indicates the component to use.
        context - Indicates the context to use.
        typeFlag - Indicates the window type.
        Returns:
        Returns the window.
        Throws:
        WindowManager.PermissionException - Throws this exception if agp window cannot show.

      • destroyWindow

        public void destroyWindow​(Window window)
        Destroys a window.
        Parameters:
        window - Indicates the window to destroy.

      • captureScreen

        public PixelMap captureScreen​(Rect rectangle,
                              int width,
                              int height,
                              int angle)
        Takes a screenshot.
        Parameters:
        rectangle - Indicates the rectangle with the specified coordinates.
        width - Indicates the width of the desired pixelmap.
        height - Indicates the height of the desired pixelmap.
        angle - Indicates the rotation angle. 0 indicates that no rotation is applied.
        Returns:
        Returns the pixelmap of the current screen.
